item.title: Flash Kali Linux Image onto USB Flash drive on Windows 10 PC - Guide
item.description: Authored by AH License Notice This article is published under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license. Table of Contents Introduction 0. Pre-preparation 0-1 Pre-preparation Reading 0-2 Download the Necessary Files 0-3 Acquire necessary devices 1. Start BalenaEtcher 2. Select File to Flash 3. Select Target Drive 4. Flash Drive Â Introduction This guide intends to provide a step-by-step guide with pictures of how create a bootable Linux usb.
